author: Barbados Today
title: #BTColumn – Assorted ‘Bimbits’ from CPL’s return to the Mecca!
description: Disclaimer: The views and opinions expressed by the author(s) do not represent the official position of Barbados TODAY. By Tony McWatt As part of its product line, the famous Canadian coffee company Tim Hortons also sells donuts, including a very popular variety known as ‘Timbits’; mini round donuts that are usually sold by the dozen.  […]The post #BTColumn – Assorted ‘Bimbits’ from CPL’s return to the Mecca! appeared first on Barbados Today.

author: BusinessWorld
title: Bringing the barista experience home
description: AUSTRALIAN brand Breville is releasing two new machines that will make your morning cup of coffee taste like it was made by a pro. The Barista Express Impress is the newest model from Breville Philippines and is Breville’s first assisted manual espresso machine. One of the star features of the model is its Impress Puck System […]

author: BusinessWorld
title: China’s Luckin sells 5.4 million Moutai alcohol-infused lattes in a day
description: BEIJING — Luckin Coffee said on Tuesday that it sold more than 5.42 million cups of the alcohol-infused latte it rolled out with Kweichow Moutai on the first day of its launch, setting a new sales record for the Chinese coffee chain. Luckin said sales of the single item on Monday topped 100 million yuan […]

author: Emily Chan
title: Adding A Coffee Bar To Your Kitchen Will Add Character To Your Space And Elevate Your Morning Routine
description: If you want to elevate your morning routine and add character to your space, consider implementing a coffee bar in your kitchen. A coffee bar is a charming spot devoted to giving you a good start to your day every day. Not only does it make mornings more convenient, but it also serves as a […]

description: A new vintage tea room is teased for Garstang serving afternoon teas, a selection of Tea’s & Coffee and cakes.

title: Have brekky and a browse at Brisbane’s best Sunday markets
description: An old-school village spirit can be found at Brisbane’s bustling Sunday markets – havens of good food, craft, coffee and community.

author: Tara Fatemi Walker
title: Quick Bites | Santa Cruz Greek Festival on deck
description: The annual Live Like a Greek Festival is in the courtyard of Prophet Elias Greek Orthodox Church this weekend. There will be Greek food for sale including souvlaki (lamb, pork, or chicken skewers), gyros, lamb-rice meatballs, spanakopita, and Greek salad. Desserts include baklava and several other handmade pastries, and drinks include Greek wine, beer and Greek coffee.

author: Kate Bradshaw, John Metcalfe, Linda Zavoral
title: 6 Bay Area sports bars to suit every type of football fan
description: Watching your favorite team score as you laze on the couch -- or jump up and down on your coffee table -- isn't a bad thing. But isn't it more fun to cheer on the game in the company of fellow fans?
